sentences.en: He was making life unbearable for his parents.
sentences.cn: 他把父母的生活弄得不堪忍受。

sentences.en: I found his cheeky self - confidence unbearable.
sentences.cn: 我感到他那种目中无人的狂妄简直令人难以忍受.

sentences.en: I hated the limelight and found it unbearable.
sentences.cn: 我讨厌惹人注目,觉得那实在令人难以忍受.

sentences.en: I was in terrible, unbearable pain.
It is unbearable to be always on thorns.
sentences.cn: 老是处于焦虑不安的情况中是受不了的.

sentences.en: Life has become unbearable to her.
sentences.cn: 对于她来说,生活变得不堪容忍.

sentences.en: Many people find the idea of any kind of invasive surgery unbearable.
sentences.cn: 很多人认为任何开刀手术都不堪忍受。

sentences.en: The film contains moments of almost unbearable poignancy.
sentences.cn: 电影中有几段几乎让人辛酸得不忍目睹。
炎热开始变得难以忍受。

sentences.en: The more he thought of it the more unbearable it became.
sentences.cn: 他越想越觉得无法忍受.

sentences.en: The old law could sentence a woman to an unbearable marriage for life, but this is now all changing.
sentences.cn: 旧法律能够迫使妇女终身接受不堪忍受的婚姻, 但这种情况现在已经完全改变了.
这样提心吊胆的状况实在叫人受不了.
等待变得让人几乎无法忍受。

sentences.en: To me moralistic films are just unbearable.
sentences.cn: 对我来说，说教电影简直难以忍受。

sentences.en: War has made life almost unbearable for the civilians remaining in the capital.
sentences.cn: 对留在首都的平民来说，战争已使生活变得几乎不堪忍受。

words.tran_cn: 不堪忍受地；无法容忍地

trans.tran_en: too unpleasant, painful, or annoying to deal with
